channel.title: Is that what supposed to happen? drunk+merc+reaper interaction
channel.description:
#### What happened? I debbed reaper n1 and got a merc guarding me that night it didn't tell me that i got attacked and immune #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I supposed to know that the attacker attacked me
I know that basicly he coudnt visit me, but i did visited him and forced him to target me.
if i can't find attackers then I don't want a merc and that doesn't make any sense.

item.title: Is that what supposed to happen? drunk+merc+reaper interaction
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Well yeah it is what is supposed to happen, though I do agree in the drunks case they probably should make an exception to what the merc does.

The merk makes his target impossible to visit. The same as being jail does. But yeah I also agree… that is kind of a bad combination when it mixes that way for drunk.
